mapper.select: select sr.latitude latitude, sr.longitude longitude, ssf.data data, dgf.name field_name from spatial_record sr, spatial_string_field ssf, data_group_field dgf where ssf.spatial_record_id = sr.id and ssf.data_group_field_id = dgf.id order by sr.id;

select sr.latitude latitude, sr.longitude longitude, snf.data data, dgf.name field_name from spatial_record sr, spatial_number_field snf, data_group_field dgf where snf.spatial_record_id = sr.id and snf.data_group_field_id = dgf.id order by sr.id;
